familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.description: Former president of DT Lido Hotel Manager LLC, of which Pres. Trump retains an ownership stake. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and exists to hold license deals that are prospective, inactive, or that otherwise do not currently have valuable assets or create income.

Former director/chairman/president of DT Lido Hotel Manager Member Corp., of which Pres. Trump retains an ownership stake. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and exists to hold license deals that are prospective, inactive, or that otherwise do not currently have valuable assets or create income.
familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.business: Dt Lido Hotel Manager Member Corp.

familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.description: Ivanka Trump served as Executive Vice President of DT LIDO HOTEL MANAGER LLC from Jun 1, 2015, until Jan 1, 2017. Ivanka Trump lists DT Lido Hotel Manager LLC (Management of Future Hotel; New York, NY) as an employment-related asset valued at (no value reported). In the year before taking her unpaid position as assistant to her father in his presidency, she earned (no income reported) in (no income type reported) income. Because there's no indication her interest in this entity has been divested or placed into a blind trust, it is marked in this database as an active potential conflict of interest.
